title: Frontend & Backend Development
description: Explore frontend and backend roles using restaurant analogies for clarity.

quiz.question: What is the main focus of User Experience (UX) Design?
What does usability testing involve?
options: Designing the visual elements of a product
Evaluating a product by testing it with real users
quiz._answer: Evaluating a product by testing it with real users

quiz.question: Which of the following is a key aspect of usability testing?
What is the purpose of interface design in UX?
options: To create layouts and visual elements
quiz._answer: To create layouts and visual elements

quiz.question: What is a wireframe in UX design?
options: An interactive model of a product
A basic, low-fidelity sketch showing page structure
A set of visual guidelines for consistency
quiz._answer: A basic, low-fidelity sketch showing page structure

quiz.question: Which tool is commonly used for wireframing and prototyping?
What is the purpose of user research in UX design?
options: To understand users' needs, behaviors, and motivations
To test the visual appeal of a product
quiz._answer: To understand users' needs, behaviors, and motivations

quiz.question: Which method is used to gather quantitative data in user research?
